Thanking, heatblast

item.title: How do i make SMF aske user to type in their username?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

If they are logged into the forums you can have it automatically carry the username variable to the vote4cash system. Checkout the SMF, SSI system. You’ll have to do something with require("/path/to/forums/SSI.php"); … And have on the vote page a log-in before proceeding to the vote links, put an if statement where the vote links will appear if the user is logged in, if the user is not logged in display the login form. Easily do this with this code:

<?php

if ($context['user']['is_guest'])
{
	// If user is not logged in .. 
	echo "You are not logged in!</br>Please Log-in or <a href='#'>Register</a>";
	// The line below displays the forums log-in form ..
	ssi_login();
} else {
	//Include the vote links here
}

?>

Or if you want an input box and a submit button to be displayed if the user hasn’t supplied a username, and the vote links to be displayed after the user types in their username, you can try this… (Quick script I wrote)

[code]<?php

if(!@$username){
if($_SERVER[‘REQUEST_METHOD’] == ‘POST’) {
$username = mysql_real_escape_string($_POST[‘username’]);
session_start();
$_SESSION[‘username’] = “$username”;
} else {
session_start();
@$username = $_SESSION[‘username’];
}
}

?>

<?php if(!$username){ ?>

Please Enter a Username before proceeding!

<?php } else { ?>

Currently logged in as <?php echo $username; ?>
Vote Link 1
Vote Link 2
Vote Link 3
Vote Link 4 <?php } ?> [/code]

I hope this was helpful, let me know if you need more help/your results.

item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“heatblast, post:3, topic:456883”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=559826.msg4089130#msg4089130 date=1346155312]

Hello,

Since i have no auto vote system , how do i make smf ask users to type in their in-game username before clicking my vote page?

Thanking,
heatblast

I don’t quite understand what you’re trying to say or do. Are you asking that the user must be logged into SMF before voting?

[/quote]

No i want smf to ask the users to type in their ingame username before going to the votepage[/quote]

Just change your playerloading/saving to the same SQL database your forums usernames and passwords are loaded, then they won’t have two separate names and they won’t have to type in their username, just pass the username through.
